title: Oklahoma City National Memorial: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Be a Junior Ranger          Oklahoma City National Memorial Junior Rangers Earn your Junior Ranger badge and learn more about the Memorial by completing our Junior Ranger program booklet. Download the booklet before your visit, or get one from a park ranger on the Memorial grounds or by calling 405-609-8855.  If mailing in your booklet, be sure to include a return address.     More fun activites are available at the WebRanger website!      Oklahoma Outdoor Ranger Challenge yourself to the next level by earning your OK Outdoor Ranger Badge.  After coming to Oklahoma City National Memorial, visit the two other National Park sites in Oklahoma; Washita Battlefield National Historic Site and Chickasaw National Recreation Area.  Complete the appropriate sections of the Oklahoma Outdoor Ranger booklet along the way and, once you are finished, you will earn a special badge!   Download the booklet before your visit, or pick one up from a park ranger on the Memorial grounds.  If mailing in your booklet, be sure to include a return address.           Presione aqui descargar una copia en formato PDF del librete guardeparque joven (1.55 MB PDF archivo).   Sea un Guardeparque Joven Gana su insignia guardeparque joven y aprender mas sobre el Monumento por completar nuestra Guardeparque Joven librete del programa. Descarga el librete antes visita, o conseguir uno de un guardeparque en el monumento o por llamando 405-609-8855.
